message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. How about $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this one. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $110 to make it worth my while.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $110 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $105.  Let me know what you think.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more wiggle room, but I need $108 to make it worth my while. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're interested.
